title: WTB  -- T206 Doc Crandall Polar Bear Back card
author: ILTBOC2

posts.post_title: WTB  -- T206 Doc Crandall Polar Bear Back card
posts.post_content:
My quest to complete the T206 Polar Bear back run is almost complete!  I'm needing only Doc Crandall (With Cap) to complete the run.  If anyone has a Crandall PB back T206 they would be willing to part with, please send me a PM with your offer.

Thanks to all of you who have helped me on my adventure so far!

Andy

Hi Andy,

Best of luck crossing the finish line. I just completed the PB subset in August, and Crandall was No. 245 for me. I ended up buying a trimmed example just so I could cross it off the list.

Hope you find one soon.

Rob

Thanks Rob. The last few cards have been fun to find. It's been fun to see what the last card would be and will be interesting to see how long it takes to acquire.  I'm glad to know it can be done as you've completed your subset!  :)


Andy
